comment:
* Helper method used to describe a single camera output * {@link Surface}. * *

Instances of this class can be used as arguments when * initializing {@link ExtensionOutputConfiguration}.

* * @see ExtensionConfiguration * @see ExtensionOutputConfiguration * @hide

methods.name: public android.util.Size getSize()
methods.comment: * Return the current requested output size

methods.name: public int getImageFormat()
methods.comment: * Return the current surface output {@link android.graphics.ImageFormat}

methods.name: public long getDynamicRangeProfile()
methods.comment:
* Return the dynamic range profile. The default
     * dynamicRangeProfile is
     * {@link android.hardware.camera2.params.DynamicRangeProfiles.STANDARD}
     * unless specified by CameraOutputSurface.setDynamicRangeProfile.

methods.name: public int getColorSpace()
public void setDynamicRangeProfile(@DynamicRangeProfiles.Profile long dynamicRangeProfile)
